guessUnconverted

public static boolean guessUnconverted(java.lang.String seq)
Returns true if it seems likely that the sequence is not bisulfite converted. Algorithm: 1. Check number of differences between the sequence and its bisulfite converted form. 2. Check number of differences between the reverse complement and its bisulfite converted form. If both of these numbers >= 2, then guess that it's unconverted.

Parameters:
seq -
Returns:
